name: market-parser-polygon-mcp
description: Unified linting and formatting for Python + React/TypeScript project

scripts.lint: npm run lint:python && npm run lint:js
scripts.format: npm run format:python && npm run format:js
scripts.fix: npm run format && npm run lint:fix
scripts.lint:fix: npm run format:python && cd gpt5-openai-agents-sdk-polygon-mcp/frontend_OpenAI && npm run lint:fix
